body.content:
Hi Dear

My name is Charles Koch, A philanthropist, the CEO and Chairman of the
Charles Koch Charitable Foundation, one of the largest private foundations
in the world. I believe strongly in"Giving" while living' I had one idea
that never changed in my mind - that you should use your wealth to help
people and I have decided to secretly give {$1,500,000.00} to randomly
selected individuals worldwide.

On receipt of this email, you should count yourself as the lucky
individual. Your email address was chosen online while searching at random.
Kindly get back to me at your earliest convenience, so I would know your
email address is valid.(* 1charleskoch@gmail.com <1charleskoch@gmail.com>* )
write me an e-mail

Regards,
Mr. Charles de Ganahl Koch,
C.E.O.
Koch Industries, Inc.
*1charleskoch@gmail.com <1charleskoch@gmail.com>*
